item.title: NEM
item.description: score:115 Chances: Gold has recently achieved an unprecedented milestone, surging to an all-time high of $2,135 per ounce, fueled by expectations of interest rate cuts and a weaker dollar. Value stocks are in a good place with forward-looking variables well-aligned for the best value stocks to hit the ground running next year.
